posting_body: ['Super Spacious 1b1b !', 'Midtown Private Balcony ,Central Park View!', 'NO FEE!', 'Listing ID #: 138397', 'Price: $4,450', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 'Apartment Amenities', 'Balcony', 'Dishwasher', 'Walk In Closet', 'This apartment features:', 'Available for a move on/after August 8th!', 'This generously proportioned south facing 1 bedroom/1 bathroom residence features a balcony, hardwood floors and oversized windows that offer excellent natural light and unparalleled city and Hudson River views!', 'Your open-concept kitchen is outfitted with granite countertops and stainless-steel appliances including a dishwasher.', 'The light and bright en-suite bathroom features floor to ceiling marble and a vanity with over-sized medicine cabinets for plenty of storage This Building features : 24-hour attended lobby, private rooftop and lounge known as the Starlight Club, an indoor atrium swimming pool and spa hot tub, fitness center and a private "green" roof deck, offering the ultimate in luxury amenities.', 'The panoramic views of Central Park, Columbus Circle and the Hudson River from the 43rd floor roof deck are spectacular.', "The building's Midtown location is one of the most desirable in Manhattan, situated near Central Park and many of the world's leading cultural venues including Lincoln Center, Carnegie Hall, Columbus Circle, Nordstrom, and Broadway theaters.", "The best of New York City's restaurants, office buildings and shopping are right at your door.", 'Magnificent Attended Lobby w/24hr Doorman & Concierge Rooftop Fitness Facility with Atrium Pool and Spa Hot Tub 9th Floor Landscaped Green Roof 43rd Floor Furnished Roof Deck and Resident Lounge Laundry Room on Every Floor On-Site Parking
